Black Judge:
Years are passing, I was once young and pure, just like you...
I was a respective judge and have done my work perfectly...
But greed overcame me. I started doing bad things.
As far as I can see you started that path as well..the karma..oh the karma..
I'm exciled now, and nobody wants me back. But I can help you! We can still save you!
I can undo some of the sins that you have done!
All you have to do is bring me 30 B grade gemstones and get our little friend, who is eating sins!
Shall we start!
